title: Problem with the ARAM community
body: I feel as if the community for ARAM has degenerated into this toxic intentional feeding group of people, who when asked to stop running into the enemy consistently always reply with "It's ARAM chill." While I understand the desire to relax and play, Riot seriously needs to do something about the level of these non-team oriented players. The amount I have had in the past several days is absurd, and it seems like there is no repercussion for these players.

replies.body: If you are worried about people having fun and going headfirst into every fight they can take in aram  I think you need to lighten up... also aram community lul
It is a team game though. Not everyone just wants to run in headfirst. You can still have fun without making your team lose on purpose.

Whats your MMR around? I play ARAM a lot with silvers and golds and I don't experience that at all. People try and it's usually a one sided game because it's ARAM. Most ARAMs are decided in champ select. Also yes I play it becausw of the reasons the llama stated.
I'm in the Silver/Gold range and I wouldn't say it's all the time but I have nights where I will play 5 games and get the same kind of people every single time.

ARAM is where SR rejects go to feel less insecure about their abilities, because it requires zero strategy, planning, or map awareness, and you cant lose solo lane.

Also the fastest way to work off a chat restriction.

There is really nothing to do about it, and there is no way to punish people for not making an effort.
